title: ARP Cache Timeline
description:
You need to prove exactly when the rogue AP first appeared on the network.

Objective: Extract and timestamp ARP cache entries (e.g., via `arp -a` and parsing) to correlate device connections and isolate the rogue MAC.
dialogue: Mira: "ARP cache timestamps will show me the moment the malicious MAC joined."
Mira: "Can you help me extract and correlate ARP cache entries?"
hints: Extract timestamped entries from the ARP cache or use system audit logs.
